prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

PLEASE DON'T CHANGE ORIGINAL TIMESTAMPS. 

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:00,460",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "あの"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:02,600",
    "end": "00:00:03,080",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "こんにちは"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:05,666",
    "end": "00:00:06,966",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "This dog is so cute."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:08,194",
    "end": "00:00:10,414",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "この犬は小さいです"
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```
